summary: This is an FAA amendment form for JEGE, LLC, a US Virgin Islands limited liability company, to change the member and manager of the LLC for aircraft registration purposes. The document shows Aviation Development Group, LLC as a member and indicates the LLC is managed by an individual manager.

connections.description: MI is listed as the manager of JEGE, LLC, which has Aviation Development Group, LLC as a member.

events.title: Establishment of JEGE, LLC
events.description: JEGE, LLC was lawfully organized as a limited liability company in the United States Virgin Islands.

events.title: FAA filing of amendment
events.description: The amendment to the statement in support of registration of a US civil aircraft in the name of JEGE, LLC was filed with the FAA Aircraft Registration Branch in Oklahoma City.

keyFacts: JEGE, LLC is a limited liability company organized in the United States Virgin Islands with an effective date of October 19, 2012.
Aviation Development Group, LLC is listed as a member of JEGE, LLC, indicating a corporate ownership structure.
The document is an amendment to change the member and manager of JEGE, LLC for FAA aircraft registration purposes.
The filing was processed by International Aircraft Title & Escrow and filed with the FAA on June 26, 2013.
The form certifies compliance with US citizenship requirements for aircraft registration under 49 U.S.C. Section 40102.
